amendment.description: An amendment numbered 47 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to reduce by, 57 percent, each amount of discretionary budget authority provided by the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 325 (Roll no. 613).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 325 (Roll no. 613).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
